metadata.title: CVE-2019-15297 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: res_pjsip_t38 in Sangoma Asterisk 15.x before 15.7.4 and 16.x before 16.5.1allows an attacker to trigger a crash by sending a declined stream in aresponse to a T.38 re-invite initiated by Asterisk. The crash occursbecause of a NULL session media object dereference.

criterions.comment: asterisk package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
